website_summaries.verdict: A basic, reliable remote, but that's really all there is to it.
pros: Straightforward design and a small, yet efficient, size
cons: Lacks an input button – a standard feature on most remote controls

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I just bought my second because I thought the first one broke but I was looking at the wrong codes someone posted a link for. Thought these would be helpful for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Works great except one problem
customer_reviews.text: I needed new remote controls for a long time for my bedroom tv and DVD player, and kept forgetting to buy one. Finally took a chance with this one since it is so inexpensive. It is small and lightweight. It works great with my tv and DVD player. The only problem is, there is no function such as left and right arrows to allow me to choose episodes through the DVD menu. The arrows only control the volume on the tv, even when I have it on DVD and VCR settings. I'd like to be able to go through the menu using left and right keys. But other than that, everything else works.
customer_reviews.author: musicfan

customer_reviews.title: Defective battery connections.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. This is now the second one I received that had the same issue. I open the package, put brand new batteries in it and it doesn’t work! I read other people’s reviews that say the springs are bad or the connections are bad and the had to rig it up to make it work but you shouldn’t have to rig up a brand new item. Obviously this is a quality control issue to receive 2 defective in the same way. Now this is the 2nd one I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Works for me, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Bought this simple and inexpensive remote to replace a lost remote of a relative in an assisted living facility. Nice size and fairly large buttons make it easy to use for seniors. I programmed it for 10 yr old Sanyo TV and setting it up only took a few minutes with the code search method. All functions related to the TV work as expected. According to the manual it can be programmed for other devices such as a DVD player or satellite receiver, but I doubt all functions of a dedicated remote for those devices would be available.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Best $6.08 I've ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to program, both my old TV and newer DVD player worked with the first code I tried for each brand. So happy with this purchase. I can finally use the sleep timer function on my TV again. TV brand was Toshiba, DVD player Sony - tons of other brands listed in the codes list that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: rinn81

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: the directions say to push the programming button until it lights up...IT NEVER LIGHTS UP! I pushed the damn button for a half hour and NOTHING. I'll be returning this product. Spend money on a good remote that works. don't waste your time with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: We have a off brand tv that we got from a friend... no remote. Took a chance & it works! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This remote doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I got this remote to use simply because my old remote had corroded batteries and stopped working. I got the cheap one because I needed it to turn on the television and control the volume only. Well, I put in new batteries (correctly) and nothing worked. I followed instructions and the remote simply did not respond. I don't know if I just got a dud remote or if they're all worthless. The one I got is definitely worthless and going right into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother Buying This
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this remote and the first one that came did not work. We got a replacement and it programmed easily. It worked just fine until the other day. It lost its programming and would not allow us to reprogram it. It lasted 2 months. We tried new batteries, left batteries out for a period of time, and could never get the light to come back on. Very disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read the Q&A - Does not Operate Source Selection on all TVs
customer_reviews.text: I have an RCA TV so I thought an RCA remote would be smart. This is compact, seems well made, and is very inexpensive, so those are positives. I spent an hour going through all the codes, trying to make it work. I guess I've been spoiled by more recent technology that magically finds the device, but okay, an hour isn't too bad. I successfully was able to turn the TV on/off, operate volume, etc., but could NEVER select between TV and HDMI inputs. This TV toggles between antenna and firestick, so being able to select source is crucial. So this device is a fail for me. BUT I did get instant refund from Amazon, so no harm...except the hour.
customer_reviews.author: Pamnkyle

customer_reviews.title: Good reliable remote
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these remotes for a couple years and just purchased two more due the original remotes for my TVs going bad. This universal remote seems to be better quality than others I've tried. The size is perfect for both my wife and me. Not too big - not too small. Buttons have good feel and reliably enter the function and/or channel number. Setup is easy. Although I use it only for TVs, it has functions for other components. Although the buttons are not illuminated, they're very well marked and easy to read in dim light. I didn't rate technical support as they've been trouble free and I've had no reason to reach out for support.
customer_reviews.author: Yomanne

customer_reviews.title: Won’t program. Makes batteries hot to the touch.
customer_reviews.text: Beware.... After placing brand new name brand batteries into remote I pressed code search following the directions. Indicator light was suppose to come on which it never did. After attempting to get this light to come on I took the batteries out and put additional new batteries in. Tried directions process again. No light. Took out batteries and they were HOT to the touch. I’ve never felt a hot battery in my life. Returning. Received replacement and was able to get the TV to work ALTHOUGH... the main reason I purchased it was for the sleep timer button and that DOESN’T work. 🙄 So second one star rating.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to program. Seems to work well.
customer_reviews.text: received a free older LCD tv without a remote. I was having trouble getting the TV to operate without a remote control. I bought this and was able to navigate the menu just and I wanted to but it turns out the TV wouldn't work when simply hooked up to coax and an antenna. I have now re-programmed the remote as a 2nd remote for our camper so I can keep this one by our bed and the other other one closer to the TV to control the DVD player for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Chad D.

customer_reviews.title: RCA Universal Remote with 4 Functions
customer_reviews.text: We have been very pleased with this little remote. We have one that controls the TV, the VCR, the DVD player, and the DirecTV box all. One of our TVs and VCR are very old (both are 15 years old), and the remotes that came with them have failed as has the DirecTV remote. This is the best universal remote we have found. It is very easy to program with the code search and is lightweight. Highly recommended if you have more than one device needing a good remote
customer_reviews.author: Ricky N.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Fast
customer_reviews.text: I've programmed many remotes over the years. Many of them required me to google a site that had thousands of manufacturer codes in order to put the right range into the remote until I find the one that works. I was very happy to see this remote being designed much better than that. You press a couple buttons to activate the code finder on the remote, click back and forth on 2 buttons until the device shuts off, and save that code with a single press. Done! Best $7 I ever spent on a remote control. Highly recommend this remote if you want ease and functionality over cost and obstacles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Item just simply doesn’t work. Indicator light didnt work on the first one but I tried it anyway...nothing. Got a replacement just days later and still no indicator light but this time I’m not pushing the button dozens of time in hopes it will somehow work. Defective item...don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this remote for my 55" RCA tv in my bedroom. When it came in i saw where it had codes to be connected to many other brands than RCA. I tried to connect it to my XBR-65-750D sony tv with the code provided and it worked first try. I was surprised by this considering most remotes found for my sony range anywhere from $20-$40. The design looks a little bulky and cheap but when it comes to getting the job done, you cant beat it for this low price. Would recommend to anyone looking for a new remote to use for general tv functions.
customer_reviews.author: Bash

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good simple remote just to use basic functions. We have digital tv that requires a dash (-) between numbers for direct tuning. I, as others, cannot get the dash to work. Also seems to confuse the remote when choosing the menu button. This sets the remote into blinking mode. This being used on a RCA tv just a couple yrs old. I used the auto program mode several times, and still does not work right. Maybe mine is just bad. I do not recommend. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good remote if you can get it working
customer_reviews.text: As received, remote didn't work. However, based on the reviews here, I knew I needed to fiddle with the contact springs in the battery compartment. Once I had expanded those, the remote started working. None of the codes for my TV worked, but I was able to find a functional set by going through all the codes one-by-one until something worked. So if you have the patience to fiddle with it, this is a fine remote, for a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the package
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to use the product. Out of the package the remote never powered. I used 3 sets of new batteries to test with. The remote appears to be undamaged but it never worked. There is a red indicator light on the top of the remote and it should light up when setting up new TV's to connect but it never worked according to the package instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased this remote because of the "sleep" button, which seems to be rare to find on universal remotes. It worked great for my newer flat screen TV. When the remote to my old TV stopped working properly, I decided to buy this remote a second time, again, because of the sleep button. Unfortunately the remote does not work for my old TV. The remote is great when it connects. Be careful when purchasing; apparently it is not eligible for return (even though it doesn't say that anywhere on the item or seller page). But Amazon Customer Support worked with me to get satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: peg78661

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one day then quit.
customer_reviews.text: The codes given for our TV brand didn't work at all. We did manage to program it eventually. However, it only worked for one day. I had some reviews that said that sometimes they had to reprogram it. We tried that and it is now stuck in the programming mode. The light flashes constantly and none of the buttons do anything. We took the batteries out and even tried leaving them out for an entire day but it still just flashes as soon as they are out back in. At least it was cheap. I decided to just buy one from Proscan.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pointer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Once you get the correct code for your TV, it works like a charm. I was in a hurry and only used the code search function and found out at the campground, I could not load cable tv stations. I use this remote for my tv in my travel trailer. I was only getting 6 stations and the campground advertised 46. I knew something was wrong. I finally reread the instructions and found the correct code and now it works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Not the replacement I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: My aging father complained about having to use multiple remotes for cable, dvd and tv. This didn't do the job. Cable remote can't change cable channels. DVD had no play option, etc... If you want something that will only turn on multiple devices, then maybe. And yes, I ran through all the possible codes for all devices. Inexpensive to try
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this remote control to replace one that no longer worked. Unfortunately, when this one arrived, it did not work, either. I tried going through the set-up instructions several times, and used fresh batteries when it didn't work the first time, but without success. I am in the process of obtaining a refund for this defective product, and I would not recommend its purchase to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: finicky
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap universal remote. Huge problem with it is if you are controlling a DVD player, you have to press the menu button to go in and out of navigation mode in order to use the arrows to move the cursor. Be careful though, you need to cover the front of the remote when doing so, else the DVD player will think you wanted to go to the main menu. Overall, I'll deal with it, but it's not a perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Lemonade Anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several universal remotes...this one NEVER worked! I must have received a lemon. Inserted batteries...followed directions for code search...unfortunately....NO LIGHT! I think I got a dud!
customer_reviews.author: IXRAYU1004

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY GOOD, BUT READ ON...
customer_reviews.text: This Remote has a fairly nice feel, and controls the Sound Volume and Channel number of my RCA Flat Screen without programming. However, there is something going on with the battery compartment. About once a day I have to unlatch the battery cover, and move the batteries and retaining springs to restore normal operation. If there is a fix for this, I would like to know about it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Turner

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice, both non functional.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this remote as a replacement for my TV and when I tried to program it, it simply didn't work. Twince I replaced the batteries and it still didn't respond. The red led light never came on. Ordered another and had the same problem. After rotating the batteries and fiddling for a while, I finally got it to respond. I programmed it and it worked. The next day I went to use it, and it did not work. I sent it back. Moved on to a more expensive remote.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Works, but missing some features
customer_reviews.text: This works as expected with one flaw. Power, channel, and volume work but there is no info button to display the program information on broadcast TV. The menu button does not work with my Sharp TV. The first one I ordered did not work at all, Amazon sent me another that did. I think the battery contacts were faulty on the first one.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Crap, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Crap!!! No better than trash. Did not work! Read reviews but didn’t listen of course! If you kind of wiggle batteries it’s would work for like a second then quit. I asked Amazon for a refund and they gave it to me! They actually said these can’t be returned just keep it plus a refund! Well I’m the trash it went. What a waste of plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done. Just make sure you switch out your batteries every once in a while.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this remote in 2017 for a small TV that did not have a remote and the side TV controls were not working. The remote did its job and was glad to still continue to use my TV (I use it as a second monitor for my laptop most of the time). It just stopped working. I think because one of the batteries leaked acid. It worked fine for a couple of weeks when I cleaned it up and now any batteries don’t work. I plan to purchase a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Barely acceptable
customer_reviews.text: The source button does not work for my Sceptre branded TV. I've tried all of the Sceptre codes. Also, the red LED sometimes blinks, and we're not sure which button we pressed to make it happen, and we're not sure which button turns it off. In the dark, it's difficult to determine if we're holding it backwards, and we can't see the button labels in the dark. For a cheap remote, it's acceptable, but not having a functional source button means I have to keep the old failing remote around just for the source button.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I have two TV screens I use on my PC and reaching around behind them to turn them on every time I sit down at the PC was a bit of a irritating process to be perfectly honest. So it was actually easier to just pick up two of these (one for each screen) and they work great. Took all of about 2 minutes to program it to the screen. only thing I wish was different is that one remote could control both monitors. However as it is it does exactly what it's advertised to do. Power, volume, etc all buttons have quick response time. Not only would purchase again... already have!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good enough, but over time?
customer_reviews.text: I found this brand of remote was small, useful, adaptable, and affordable. However, I also found that they scrimped on the button tech, with the unit eventually unusable because the buttons lose their functionality. It might depend upon the user, too, but for me, the remote worked fine until it just stopped...
customer_reviews.author: Beantown Jim

customer_reviews.title: Palm size
customer_reviews.text: I have an older element TV so all this remote does for me is the basic power volume and channel but that's pretty much all I need it for it seems to be kind of Hit and Miss sometimes whether it's going to change channels whereas I have to mash the up or down buttons two or three times before the channels actually go up or down other than that seems to be very durable and very easy to handle
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This remote is deceptive. It says it can be ...
customer_reviews.text: This remote is deceptive. It says it can be programmed for DVD players, but there aren't any arrow keys for navigation. What's the point if there aren't any arrow keys on the remote? Any DVD player remote in the last 20 years has 4 arrow keys. In my case, I couldn't control my 4 year old Sony Blu-Ray player. Spend a few bucks more if you need to control any modern device.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Button malfunctioned
customer_reviews.text: Got remote today, opened the package and put brand new batteries in the remote. When my husband and I push the code search button it does not respond at all. We held the button for 5 minutes, 3 minutes 30 seconds did not matter. The light would not flash. Was a waste of time and money. This is sad because I have bought this brand of remote from family dollar locally 5 years ago and it worked fine for 5 years till my dog ate it. Will be returning this remote.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Fauber

customer_reviews.title: EXTRA EXTRA this remote is crap!
customer_reviews.text: Let’s start with a critique of the basic graphic design. The numbers are too far over to the left. Seriously look at the photo. If you have even the slightest hint of OCD this will drive you mad. Next it’s just fragile and cheap as hell. It weighs as much as a piece of paper and will break very easily. Lastly it does not perform as expected. I followed the directions to a T for my television brand. Most buttons work however the source button, arguably the most important for a universal remote doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my TV only
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping to connect my TV, Xbox, AppleTV, and Speakers/Woofer through one remote but am disappointed. The only thing I was able to manage was to connect it to my TV so I can once again turn it on and off with a remote. The remote control on-off button that came with my Vizio TV finally broke, so I wanted to replace that as well as not have separate remotes for sound and other things but no luck. The codes for programming this remote to pair with my other devices did not include anything but the TV. I'm keeping it because it was inexpensive, but it was not a long term solution.
customer_reviews.author: Choosey Susi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup & use
customer_reviews.text: This universal remote was easy to sit-up and simple to use. Be careful not to trash the instructions, which are included in the packaging. If you do loose them, like I did, it is easy to find them online. The buttons are large and easy to use. There is nothing difficult about this remote.
customer_reviews.author: L Boettcher

customer_reviews.title: Great for controlling hotel TVs although a touch bulky.
customer_reviews.text: A touch bulky but gets the job done. Bought these for travel. I'm a road warrior. In hotels at least a couple of days a week for work. Some hotel remotes are very bare bones. Sometimes they don't include the input button and some TVs done have buttons on the TV itself for this. I travel with a Roku stick so I can watch Netflix, etc while on the road. This makes that possible. Bonus points for a germophobe like me, not having to touch the hotel remote.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: TAKE CONTROL of the time you squander with TV!
customer_reviews.text: this universal remote works with my 170lb Sony trinitron The trinitron would be useful as artificial reef material if it were not laden with heavy metals, but at least now we are couch potato-ing in style and can concentrate more on junk food while we watch the largely mindless crap on cable. Next step......quit TV completely and wait for our brains to regenerate my last remote worked well for years and cost only $.99 but the buttons had become sticky and sluggish. I'd give this RCA unit 5 stars but it cost 5 times as much.......the TV was free....all it cost me is a sore back
customer_reviews.author: livebike

customer_reviews.title: straightforward and works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good. It's pretty straightforward and works as expected. I only wish there was a simpler remote in the same price range. I bought this for my 5 year old son and sometimes he gets confused with all the extra buttons on it. All he needs is power and volume. Anything else could change the settings so he can't watch Roku. I can't ding it too much for not being the product I want, however. I knew that when I bought it, but I had to compromise because of the high cost of specialized limited function remotes. I guess in the long run it's better he has to deal with it and expand his knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Barnes

customer_reviews.title: EASY PEASY
customer_reviews.text: This RCA Universal remote was the easiest one I have ever used to program. I followed the instructions and got it programmed after trying the third number on the list for my tv. It is great, works like a charm. I also like the smaller size very much. The buttons are placed right where they are needed , the turn on button, sleep button and volume are easy to find even in the dark watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte A. Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Good and simple but limited functions
customer_reviews.text: Limited functions but easy to program and works great. I had to try 3 battery sets when I programmed it because the light wouldnt turn on and it reccomends fresh batteries so perhaps the first 2 sets I tried were old. The arrows control channels and volume so you cannot use it to scroll so I have to use my fire stick remote to select but at least my tv turns on and off again!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Figueiredo

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer did not consider Roku devices
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to setup but not easy to use on my TCL Roku tv. To select anything you have to hit menu, the device you want and select then menu again to revert the left right buttons to volume control. If you don't select it back it will do it automatically and take you back to your home screen. The volume buttons need to be their own buttons. To select anything you arrow through at the top of the remote and then select enter at the bottom. It's a bully little remote so for me it almost takes two hands. You get what you pay for. I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for both CRT and flatscreen TVs
customer_reviews.text: I was given a free RCA flat screen TV (46LA45RQ) and a free Toshiba CRT TV/VCR combo, both without their remotes. This worked for both. Easy set-up. Might have to buy a second remote for the little Toshiba. Funny that this is an RCA-branded remote, but that it is preset with Samsung codes and not RCA.
customer_reviews.author: pocahotness

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and great size.
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a used SUV which has a DVD player built in, but it didn't come with the remote. I bought a $30 remote here on Amazon that was "supposed" to be compatible. When I received it it wouldn't work. I sent it back ,a bought one of these as a Hail-Mary hoping it would work. I put it in scan mode and it found the code within less than 10 seconds. Tested it out and this thing is fantastic. Couldn't have imagined something costing 1/6th the price would work so wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Mcgrath

customer_reviews.title: sucks!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to get it working with my TV (I bought an RCA remote because my TV is RCA and other remotes NEVER work with these TVs) when it finally worked it stopped working, all of the sudden it just stops working and you have to take out the batteries and re program the remote and that takes a looong time for every time you want to turn on or off the TV or raise the volume! sucks!
customer_reviews.author: maria rebbeca choriego

customer_reviews.title: RCA?  Never Again
customer_reviews.text: This remote never worked from the get go - right out of the box. The SETUP light never came on and I made sure I had fresh batteries and the polarity was correct. Many years ago I said I would never buy RCA again. I should have listened to my own advice. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nunya

customer_reviews.title: This remote did not work and cannot be returned!
customer_reviews.text: After installing new batteries, the indicator light in step one would not come on so there was no way to program this remote. More disturbing however, and little did I know that there is a no return policy on this pos. The reason for that is now obvious to me. Shame on you Amazon for allowing this seller on your site. Buyers beware and go buy something locally that you know you can return.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Otis

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Apple TV
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to cut down on the amount of remotes and I bought this by searching for Apple TV compatible universal remotes. Works fine for TV and DVD player but WILL NOT WORK FOR APPLE TV. I do like that there are just enough buttons and not an excess like the original TV remote. This one's buttons are easier to find.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work. FML
customer_reviews.text: This remote was dead right from the package. I spent time ordering this garbage, now I have to print a return label and send it back. Huge inconvenience...huge pile of crap. Is it shame on me for buying an inexpensive product, or shame on Amazon for selling it?
customer_reviews.author: Kubala

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly to turn tv on and off and for volume control. Only stream in our room so didn’t need it for much else! Easy to program too.
customer_reviews.author: Karly

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother...Won't work.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Surprised from RCA. This is the second one that WILL NOT WORK. Indicator light will NOT light. Tried everything... different unit....different NEW batteries. Very disappointing. Wanted to replace remote that quit working for endangered species VCR.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ann Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Poorly assembled
customer_reviews.text: Received one that did not function. A replacement was quickly sent. It also did not work at all. I opened up the second one and found I could reposition the battery contacts. Worked after that. This is not the sort of thing a consumer should need to do.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Magical! ( not in a good way :( )
customer_reviews.text: Easy to program easy to use inexpensive with large buttons only issue is that my TV now turns itself ON whenever it wants! Truly magical, but not in a good way :( I now unplug the TV when not watching.....if only it worked correctly ALL of the time
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to program saved the old TV.
customer_reviews.text: Relatives TV remote died. I needed something that could turn the TV on and off and change volume or a new TV. This remote has sufficiently big buttons is easy to operate and _for_me_ was easy to program. If you've programmed the remotes before you should have not problem with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Got a 2 pack. One didn't work at all right out of the box. Second one worked less than a month. Bought a better one at Family Dollar for $8. Contacted Amazon and returning them was going to be ridiculously complicated. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Danico

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: The size is great but I’ve had it replaced and neither the original nor replacement has worked. The light won’t even go on when setting up. I’m great at following instructions and I’m positive I’ve followed the simple directions accurately. My television is a model that is listed but I didn’t even get to that point of the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use- DURABLE!
customer_reviews.text: This remote is great for the price. I’ve had it for 2 years now and it’s still going strong. Easy access to basic settings and really saved me after I lost my original remote. My advice is to save the instruction manual!! I’ve had to re-program a few times and you need the manual to reference the program instructions/code. Only take a minute! If you’re looking for a simple remote that will get the job done, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Maroon

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with Digital Stream
customer_reviews.text: NONE of the codes or methods to find a code worked for this. It was "guaranteed" to work with our Digital Stream converter box. An hour and many searches later, there was nothing that worked. It's going back!
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Gee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: My Vizio TV remote stopped working so I bought this RCA remote control hoping to save me from walking to the TV to turn it on/off or adjusting the volume. This remote is compact and cheap. But I guess you get what you pay for because after the inital set up (which is easy to do) the remote doesn't do anything. No matter how much I point, press, and moving about in front of the TV (60"), the remote doesn't do anything to control the TV (even though the red light lights up every time I press a button). So I swapped the batteries, setting it up with a different code - still doesn't work. Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: QT

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK...
customer_reviews.text: We were able to program this remote to work with a Westinghouse brand TV. But we can’t use this remote to change the input mode (switching from cable to the DVD player to the Fire Stick, etc.) — we still have to do that directly on the TV panel. But we can change channels, adjust volume, and turn the TV off and on with this remote so it’ll work.
customer_reviews.author: Kilikikina22

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use till the first drop then its trash
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to program in fact I somehow programmed 2 of my tv's which one would turn off instead of the one I wanted to turn off. It slipped out of my hand and fell to the wood floor in my house I was sitting down so it was a 2 ft drop. Well that actually broke the remote so this thing is a piece of crap worse than I believed it would be. My opinion spend the extra 5-15 bucks for a less delicate remote.
customer_reviews.author: Skuttle

customer_reviews.title: My bad. Will get a different brand next time
customer_reviews.text: the batteries disconnect it the back is on. Connection parts aren’t in the proper place. Making it work because I‘d rather not go through the return hassle and would like a remote now. Wouldn’t buy again. Regret not getting a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Pigspud

customer_reviews.title: Synced well with my second-hand TV
customer_reviews.text: Only button I wish it had were 'Exit', for when I accidentally press 'Menu'. But that's hardly a complaint, you can see all the buttons they provide yourself. Bought this remote after acquiring a second-hand TV, so my expectations were met for simply switching sources and volume. I don't use cable, DVD controls.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good for televisions that cable/satellite remotes cannot control
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the remote for my RCA television because the DirecTV remote cannot be programmed to work with my TV. This small RCA remote was able to control my television, though it took awhile to get it programmed, since none of the provided codes worked. Luckily, the remote was able to cycle through signals until I found one that worked. I mainly use the remote to turn the TV on and off, select HDMI inputs, and control volume, and it does all of these things well. I don't use the multiple device control or the number keys, but I have no reason to think they don't work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vogel

customer_reviews.title: It's a standard universal remote, and it works.
customer_reviews.text: This does what it says it will. I bought it hoping that instead of connecting it to a DVD player or VCR, I could use that button to connect it to our Vizio sound bar, but sadly that didn't work. I use this this for our TV, our Roku 2, and our DVD player, so I'm down to just 2 remotes, this one and our sound bar remote. My husband doesn't like how thick it is, we're used to having slimmer remotes, but it doesn't get in the way of it's functionality, and it worked perfectly for our budget. We've had it for a couple months now and haven't had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good remote
customer_reviews.text: The remote would work for the reason I bought it, but it also has design flaws. If you are needing the arrows (left-right) that is the volume button and you cannot (or I’m not smart enough to figure out how to) move left or right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little cheap remote
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap remote control because the house I'm staying in for 6 months did not have one for the TV. This remote is bare bones basic but it works great. Extremely easy to program...no need for codes. It has plenty of range and raised buttons so you can use it in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: This was an inexpensive and easy fix. All the functions seem to work fine
customer_reviews.text: Remote was ready to program to use for our 55" Sanyo flat screen. We got rid of cable and couldn't find the original remote that came with the tv. This was an inexpensive and easy fix. All the functions seem to work fine. We only have 1 device programmed which is the tv. The battery seems to last pretty long as well. The reason I deducted one star is because it doesn't have a button to change the screen size/pic mode to allow for movie watching on wide screen. Other than that, it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: LittleRochi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Remote!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this remote twice and by the stroke of my luck, none of those two remotes worked. I put in fresh batteries and tried turning it on to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: So I got this in hopes of being able to program my VHS/DVD combo player. Unfortunately, there's no way to do that with this remote. You can only do basic functions with it. I also was unable to pair the remote with my lg blu ray player. I tried all of the lg codes and even did the code search manually and still couldn't get it to work. So that sucks. It would be a fine remote for someone just wanting something super super basic. But don't buy it if you're hoping to get many functions.
customer_reviews.author: B Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Easy, works
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to program. I have it programmed to 2 differnt TV in differnt rooms. Therr are just 2 people here and we both have tcs in our room plus one in the livingroom. I use the remote in my room or the livingroom, depending on where I am.
customer_reviews.author: Paulak

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain universal remote.
customer_reviews.text: This remote works perfectly to control my TCL Roku smart TV with one of the codes that comes along with the remote. Also controls my LG Blu-ray player. The remote itself is a little bulky in the hand and is ultra light weight, almost to the point of feeling it would break if it fell on a hard surface.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival. I read some other reviews now and am guessing I have the same issue of bad battery alignment. I may try to fix it myself still, but this is nonsense -- I should not have to fix this. Spend a little extra on a different remote. Edit: I got it working just fine now, I think. I used a needle and tweezers to pull out the + terminals a bit and angle one of the - terminals more upward. Again though, I should not have had to fix this for a brand new product.
customer_reviews.author: Kolleen Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to program.
customer_reviews.text: Good basic universal remote. Code search worked to program the remote to my TV and I had it working within 5 minutes. Some remotes are a pain to program so I was worried that I might have trouble with this one, but that wasn't the case. Very good price on this item. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Hackney

customer_reviews.title: This Universal Remote Works!
customer_reviews.text: My Samsung TV remote control doesn't have a sleep button and I find it too much trouble to go to the menu every single time I want the TV to shut off at night. The sleep button works fine. I like the size of this remote because it fits easily in my hand. I also programmed the remote to control my Direct TV. I was not able to get the guide on my Direct TV, but you can turn it on and off and change the volume and the channels. The price is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: I surprised myself by getting this remote programmed to work ...
customer_reviews.text: I surprised myself by getting this remote programmed to work with my old TV that I rarely watch. But I had let the batteries corrode and ruin the one that came with the Sylvannia. I had bought a universal remote for another TV and it does not have the "sleep" function. This one does, although no one sleeps in the room where the TV is located. G;ad to have a working remote when I need a spare TV, such as wanting to watch a program while I am recording 2 shows on my large flat screen TV because Time Warner will not let me record 2 and watch another..
customer_reviews.author: Txgranny

customer_reviews.title: We bought this for our daughter...
customer_reviews.text: Okay, we didn't buy this remote to use with the corresponding electronic device. We bought it because our daughter kept stealing the TV remote and crying if we took it away. We tried everything -- baby remotes, other toys, letting her keep the TV remote -- and eventually decided to buy her this remote to play with. We didn't put batteries in it. She likes to hold it while we hold our remote. Everyone is happy.
customer_reviews.author: K S

customer_reviews.title: Spend a few more dollars, even if you need only the basics
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, but didn’t work. Didn’t expect much from a cheap remote. At a minimum expected it to at least function at the most basic level. The remote didn’t work (literally didn’t even function with batteries, and I tried a few sets) right out of the box. Thought it was the batteries but it wasn’t. I bought a paperweight that couldn’t even weigh down paper.
customer_reviews.author: Derin N.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: My TV remote for my RCA died. I bought this one super cheap and it came super fast. I had to press a bunch of buttons in a certain combination but once that was over it works. I could control more devices with it but their remotes still work.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Thomason

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to setup and works well. Great price. Not a ton of whistles and bells, but it has multi-device support, mute, go back, forward, backward, play, pause, stop, etc.... all the standard stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Rich R.

customer_reviews.title: Simple, uncomplicated and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 86 year old father when his Emerson remote died. He had picked up a universal remote at Walmart, but it was too complicated to program for his TV, so he stuffed it in a drawer. He was able to get this one programmed in minutes and loves the simplicity - not overwhelmed with buttons. He threw away the original remote and the universal one he bought and uses this one exclusively.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Broke after an hour
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about an hour and then broke on me. The batteries were brand new, so if I had to assume, I'd guess the control is made out of such cheap material it probably couldn't last that long packaged/ stored away. At least you get what you paid for. I'd recommend to just spend the extra $10 on a better universal controller.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Soto

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Basic TV and Blu-ray functionality
customer_reviews.text: This universal remote worked very well with an older model Vizio. The remote comes with a user manual that contains factory codes for industry leading TVs. Excellent remote for the price for basic TV and Blu-ray functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Kingshopper

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this remote control. It is really compact and really good. We have an old tv that we lost the remote control. I thought this would not work but it did. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Danny2019

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last very long.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. One early December 2019. It didn’t work. Seller replaced it. The replacement worked fine so I ordered another end of December 2019. Now neither will work. I have changed batteries in both and they still don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Gil8052

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical since i have an off-brand TV (Hisense), but it worked on the first code. I'm very happy, after my old remote only worked to change channels and volume. For the price it's a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Bengel

customer_reviews.title: I have not tried to control anything else with it as I don't like to try to control multiple appliances with just one ...
customer_reviews.text: It doses what I wanted which was to rep for my TV which had quit working. I have not tried to control anything else with it as I don't like to try to control multiple appliances with just one remote. I always get confused and frustrated. The only problem I had with this remote was there were several different codes for my TV brand and getting the correct one was strictly trial and error. My son tells me they are all like that so I can't hold it against the product. Overa;;, I am satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I give it five stars because of the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very, very easy to program. Came with very simple instructions. For $6 it is so worth it. Having Prime also made it even better with free two day shipping. I was impressed with this control because it was able to program to my TV made by Viore. Reason why it impressed me is my television is a major China made off brand. Still great television especially for the price of them also. My remote for this television got broke by someone sitting on it. (No not me) Original replacement remote was over $35.00. So this was a no brainier to buy. So far it has worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Legitly67

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a cheap remote
customer_reviews.text: The installation was a bit tedious. It constantly loses connection with my TV forcing me to reprogram my remote at least every other week. I threw away the instructions after the second time thinking it would be fine, only for it to keep disconnecting from the TV. Luckily, the internet has just about everything and I was able to find the instructions to reprogram the remote again. Besides the disconnect from the TV, it works just as a remote should.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: It's OK, and is what it is -- a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's OK, and is what it is -- a cheap replacement for a dead remote. None of the listed device codes worked, so I needed to use the auto search feature to find the code for my RCA TV and Sony DVD player, but it worked so all is well. Some functionality with the TV is convoluted, and I'm reasonably certain my wife (who is remote-challenged) will never learn the sequence. If you don't quickly/easily learn how remotes work, pass on this and spend more money for a more fully-featured remote.
customer_reviews.author: Nataraj

customer_reviews.title: Two minutes to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Super quick set up. Needed for remotes for four TVs (after dropping cable) so I purchased two of these to see how they worked and was able to set up my first two TVs with in two minutes each. I ordered two more and was able to sync to other TVs up within two minutes each as well.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiW

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, we were in need of a remote since the dogs ate ours and money was tight since we have a newborn. We haven’t had any issues out of this remote and it was super simple to pair with our devices.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Johnson

customer_reviews.title: You might need to fiddle with the battery terminals, but otherwise a solid cheapo replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work right out of the box. But other reviews here mentioned that the positive battery terminals weren't making contact with batteries and causing the same effect. I pried them out a bit with tweezers and now it works. Programmed it up to my TV following the manual instructions and it's working great and much cheaper than a dedicated replacement remote.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great on two different TV's (two different brands) of mine that were previously missing remotes. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because I wish it had a select button! Sometimes changing menu options can be difficult/impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey W.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t pair well with everything listed
customer_reviews.text: I’m am pretty tech savvy. It took 4 different days to pair this remote to my 📺 and can only use it for volume and sometimes channels(truly didn’t need that option lol). Will not power on or off tv ;which was 1 of 2 reasons I bought this. Power and volume. I guess, I should be thankful that at least 1 of those are functioning.
customer_reviews.author: B.klynA.S.

product_meta.title: RCA RCR503BZ 3-Device Palm-Sized Universal Remote
feature_bullets: Controls Up To 3 Devices, Replaces and Consolidates Most Major Remote Brands, Simplifies Device Setup With Automatic, Manual & Direct Code Search Methods
Palm-sized design makes the remote easy and comfortable to hold
Easy-to-use keys with multi-colored keypad, 2 AAA batteries sold separately
Keys for TV, DVD or VCR, and satellite receiver, cable box, or digital TV converter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars4,069 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
